speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Bardolph, get thee before to Coventry. Fill

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: me a bottle of sack. Our soldiers shall march

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: through. We’ll to Sutton Coldfield tonight.

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: Will you give me money, captain?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Lay out, lay out.

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: This bottle makes an angel.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: An if it do, take it for thy labor. An if it make

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: twenty, take them all. I’ll answer the coinage. Bid

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: my lieutenant Peto meet me at town’s end.

speaker: BARDOLPH
text: I will, captain. Farewell.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: If I be not ashamed of my soldiers, I am a

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: soused gurnet. I have misused the King’s press

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: damnably. I have got, in exchange of a hundred

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: and fifty soldiers, three hundred and odd pounds. I

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: press me none but good householders, yeomen’s

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: sons, inquire me out contracted bachelors, such as

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: had been asked twice on the banns—such a commodity

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: of warm slaves as had as lief hear the devil

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: as a drum, such as fear the report of a caliver worse

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: than a struck fowl or a hurt wild duck. I pressed me

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: none but such toasts-and-butter, with hearts in their

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: bellies no bigger than pins’ heads, and they have

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: bought out their services, and now my whole

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: charge consists of ancients, corporals, lieutenants,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: gentlemen of companies—slaves as ragged as Lazarus

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: in the painted cloth, where the glutton’s dogs

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: licked his sores; and such as indeed were never

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: soldiers, but discarded, unjust servingmen, younger

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: sons to younger brothers, revolted tapsters, and

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: ostlers tradefallen, the cankers of a calm world and

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: a long peace, ten times more dishonorable-ragged

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: than an old feazed ancient; and such have I to fill up

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: the rooms of them as have bought out their services,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: that you would think that I had a hundred and fifty

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: tattered prodigals lately come from swine-keeping,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: from eating draff and husks. A mad fellow met me

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: on the way and told me I had unloaded all the

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: gibbets and pressed the dead bodies. No eye hath

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: seen such scarecrows. I’ll not march through Coventry

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: with them, that’s flat. Nay, and the villains

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: march wide betwixt the legs as if they had gyves on,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: for indeed I had the most of them out of prison.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: There’s not a shirt and a half in all my company,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: and the half shirt is two napkins tacked together

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: and thrown over the shoulders like a herald’s coat

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: without sleeves; and the shirt, to say the truth,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: stolen from my host at Saint Albans or the red-nose

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: innkeeper of Daventry. But that’s all one; they’ll find

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: linen enough on every hedge.

speaker: PRINCE
text: How now, blown Jack? How now, quilt?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: What, Hal, how now, mad wag? What a devil

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: dost thou in Warwickshire?—My good Lord of

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Westmoreland, I cry you mercy. I thought your

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Honor had already been at Shrewsbury.

speaker: WESTMORELAND
text: Faith, Sir John, ’tis more than time

speaker: WESTMORELAND
text: that I were there and you too, but my powers are

speaker: WESTMORELAND
text: there already. The King, I can tell you, looks for us

speaker: WESTMORELAND
text: all. We must away all night.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Tut, never fear me. I am as vigilant as a cat to

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: steal cream.

speaker: PRINCE
text: I think to steal cream indeed, for thy theft hath

speaker: PRINCE
text: already made thee butter. But tell me, Jack, whose

speaker: PRINCE
text: fellows are these that come after?

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Mine, Hal, mine.

speaker: PRINCE
text: I did never see such pitiful rascals.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Tut, tut, good enough to toss; food for powder,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: food for powder. They’ll fill a pit as well as

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: better. Tush, man, mortal men, mortal men.

speaker: WESTMORELAND
text: Ay, but, Sir John, methinks they are

speaker: WESTMORELAND
text: exceeding poor and bare, too beggarly.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Faith, for their poverty, I know not where

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: they had that, and for their bareness, I am sure they

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: never learned that of me.

speaker: PRINCE
text: No, I’ll be sworn, unless you call three fingers

speaker: PRINCE
text: in the ribs bare. But, sirrah, make haste. Percy is

speaker: PRINCE
text: already in the field.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: What, is the King encamped?

speaker: WESTMORELAND
text: He is, Sir John. I fear we shall stay too

speaker: WESTMORELAND
text: long.

speaker: FALSTAFF
text: Well,

speaker: FALSTAFF
text:
To
               
              the
               
              latter
               
              end
               
              of
               
              a
               
              fray
               
              and
               
              the
               
              beginning
               
              of
               
              a
               
              feast

speaker: FALSTAFF
text:
Fits
               
              a
               
              dull
               
              fighter
               
              and
               
              a
               
              keen
               
              guest
              .
